Video.title: Video

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile information, readable by the owner and admins.

/roles/{userId}.description: Maps user UIDs to their role. This collection is read-only for clients but writeable by admins.

/contactSubmissions/{contactSubmissionId.description: Stores contact form submissions. Only accessible by admins.

/news/{articleId}.description: Stores news articles. Publicly readable, but only writeable by editors and admins.

/events/{eventId}.description: Stores parish events. Publicly readable, but only writeable by editors and admins.

/faq/{faqId}.description: Stores frequently asked questions. Publicly readable, but only writeable by editors and admins.

/albums/{albumId}.description: Stores photo albums for the media gallery. Publicly readable, but only writeable by editors and admins.

/videos/{videoId}.description: Stores video metadata for the media gallery. Publicly readable, but only writeable by editors and admins.
